Author: meyokoe
Content: I will be putting bold titles as to what topic i will be rambling

Author: meyokoe
Content:
**My views on AI to be used for _creation_**

Lets define and give some context and background before i dive into this topic, some of you may agree, others may disagree, that is fine, me personally? As much as i dislike it, id figure it be better to explain why AI is viewed as a bad thing in the Creative Industry world, and more specifically, Artists

Author: meyokoe
Content: I myself draw, i have a plethera of sketchbooks all over my teen years, and i still draw to this day, although i draw in short spurts and I sometimes practice, I also dive in Graphic design as that is my main hardskill,  Video editing, Fashion, Photography, Makeup, and a bit of VA and Narration work. I pretty much do what art students do, except i'm not one, but i can vouch for my skills and I do have results i can share, but this whole segment is to introduce of what kind of person i am that allowed me to be able to vouch the art industry as a whole as to why we (and yes, _we_) dislike the use of AI

Author: meyokoe
Content:
There is a difference between _Creation_ and _Production_

Creation is the process in which that it deliberately combines previous ideas into an original construct, or original ideas that creates an original construct, it is form by the human mind, no two constructs are the same, they can be similar, but they are not the same.

It also appeals towards one person only, as even if it was exposed to other people, it originates from itself, for itself, by itself

Author: meyokoe
Content: on the other hand, Production is a process that constructs ideas to appeals to the majority, even if its created by an individual, it still mass produces to appeal to it. What it also created is standardization, in which that everyone gets the equal amount, because you cannot assume the same person would have the same specific appeal, but it does have a threshold of what is "acceptable" by the majority

Author: meyokoe
Content:
Art is a form of self expression and beauty, by both the process and result, its what made it as a hobby loved by everyone, the ability to be able to express what you feel in your own, weird, wacky, snazzy way, with your own twist, knick knacks and all kinds of little detail and personality as well as the process of creating an expression is what made art a versatile medium and a hobby that is well loved and mostly appreciated.

The "downside", but moreso it that it happens like everything else, is that the process of creating it is very difficult, time consuming, and overall material and muscle coordination memory that is what stops and demotivates alot of people into stepping into art

Author: meyokoe
